Commentary.ab: Y11.10a aṣ̌auuāzō] nom. sg. as voc. sg. (exp. *aṣ̌auuāzā̊).
Y11.10b haōmāi] Pirart haōma. Kellens, 2007 p. 90 "datif incompatible avec le vocatif; la restitution de *haoma (Pirart) crée une répétition suspecte".
Y11.10c aṣ̌auua] nom. sg. as voc. sg.; Pirart contra cod. exp. ⁺aṣ̌āum.

Nerangs.ab: zōt dast pad bun ī barsom frāz dārišn ud frabardār ul ō dast ī dašn ī zōt nihišn zōt gōwēd pairi.tē. haōma aṣ̌āum aṣ̌auuāzō tā vīspō.xᵛāϑrəm.
"The zōt has to hold his hand on the beginning of the barsom and the frabardār has to put the parāhōm in the right hand of the zōt The zōt says: pairi.tē haōma aṣ̌āum aṣ̌auuāzō until vīspō.xᵛāϑrəm."
parāhōm ul ō ī dast ī dast ī dašn ī zōt nihišn' zōt bē gōwēd pairi.tē haōma aṣ̌āum aṣ̌auuāzō daδąmi...
"He has to put the parāhōm in the right hand of the zōt. The zōt says: pairi.tē haōma aṣ̌āum aṣ̌auuāzō daδąmi...

Quotations.ab: u-š dast pad bun ī barsom frāz dārišn frabardār parāhōm ul *ō *dast nihišn ud pairi tē haoma aṣ̌əm vohū III be gōwišn
"He has to keep his hand on the lower part of the barsom. The frabradār puts it in the zōt's hand, and (the zōt) has to recite pairi tē haoma and three aṣ̌əm vohū."

ab.ab: "The assistant priest after touching the hom cup to the bundle (and) touching (it) to the moon-shaped stands, he puts (it) in the chief priest’s right hand, and the chief priest looking at the hom inside the cup, recites."
"While holding the parāhōm cup, the zot recites st. l 0, which extols the exhilarating properties of the parāhōm juice."
